--- create_table_row_deletion_policy.sql
create table foo (
  foo int64,
  bar int64,
  baz timestamp,
) primary key (),
  row deletion policy ( older_than ( baz, INTERVAL 30 DAY ) )

--- AST
&ast.CreateTable{
  Rparen: 77,
  Name:   &ast.Path{
    Idents: []*ast.Ident{
      &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 13,
        NameEnd: 16,
        Name:    "foo",
      },
    },
  },
  Columns: []*ast.ColumnDef{
    &ast.ColumnDef{
      Null: -1,
      Name: &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 21,
        NameEnd: 24,
        Name:    "foo",
      },
      Type: &ast.ScalarSchemaType{
        NamePos: 25,
        Name:    "INT64",
      },
      Hidden: -1,
    },
    &ast.ColumnDef{
      Null: -1,
      Name: &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 34,
        NameEnd: 37,
        Name:    "bar",
      },
      Type: &ast.ScalarSchemaType{
        NamePos: 38,
        Name:    "INT64",
      },
      Hidden: -1,
    },
    &ast.ColumnDef{
      Null: -1,
      Name: &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 47,
        NameEnd: 50,
        Name:    "baz",
      },
      Type: &ast.ScalarSchemaType{
        NamePos: 51,
        Name:    "TIMESTAMP",
      },
      Hidden: -1,
    },
  },
  RowDeletionPolicy: &ast.CreateRowDeletionPolicy{
    Comma:             78,
    RowDeletionPolicy: &ast.RowDeletionPolicy{
      Row:        82,
      Rparen:     140,
      ColumnName: &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 117,
        NameEnd: 120,
        Name:    "baz",
      },
      NumDays: &ast.IntLiteral{
        ValuePos: 131,
        ValueEnd: 133,
        Base:     10,
        Value:    "30",
      },
    },
  },
}

--- SQL
CREATE TABLE foo (
  foo INT64,
  bar INT64,
  baz TIMESTAMP
) PRIMARY KEY (), ROW DELETION POLICY ( OLDER_THAN ( baz, INTERVAL 30 DAY ))
